languages.text: "Чую, за его голову можно не страшиться. По повадке вижу, что в дряхлом теле таится дух могучего воина. Такой будет стоять в гуще схватки, по колено в крови врагов да с мрачной молитвой на устах".

traits.locale_text: "Чую, за его голову можно не страшиться. По повадке вижу, что в дряхлом теле таится дух могучего воина. Такой будет стоять в гуще схватки, по колено в крови врагов да с мрачной молитвой на устах".

languages.text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."
languages.original_text: "Чую, за его голову можно не страшиться. По повадке вижу, что в дряхлом теле таится дух могучего воина. Такой будет стоять в гуще схватки, по колено в крови врагов да с мрачной молитвой на устах".

"I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

languages.text: «No huelo razón alguna para preocuparse de que este mantenga la cabeza sobre los hombros. Su porte lo dice todo: este cuerpo desgastado oculta el espíritu de un poderoso guerrero, de los que siguen firmes en mitad de la batalla, con las rodillas empapadas de sangre y una sombría plegaria en los labios».
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

traits.locale_text: «No huelo razón alguna para preocuparse de que este mantenga la cabeza sobre los hombros. Su porte lo dice todo: este cuerpo desgastado oculta el espíritu de un poderoso guerrero, de los que siguen firmes en mitad de la batalla, con las rodillas empapadas de sangre y una sombría plegaria en los labios».

languages.text: 「この者の首がその肩の上にあることを心配する理由はない。彼の立ち振る舞いがすべてを物語っている。そのすり減った身体の下に隠されているのは、戦いのさなかに血に膝まで浸かり、唇に厳しい祈りを捧げながら堂々と立つ、強大な戦士の魂だ」
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

traits.locale_text: 「この者の首がその肩の上にあることを心配する理由はない。彼の立ち振る舞いがすべてを物語っている。そのすり減った身体の下に隠されているのは、戦いのさなかに血に膝まで浸かり、唇に厳しい祈りを捧げながら堂々と立つ、強大な戦士の魂だ」

languages.text: “这个人的头是绝对不会被砍掉的，这一点没什么好担心。他的举止让我看到了真相：这具衰老的躯体之中，隐藏着强大战士的灵魂。像这样的战士，曾在无数场战斗中屹立不倒，在深及膝盖的鲜血中颂唱着严峻的祷告。”
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

traits.locale_text: “这个人的头是绝对不会被砍掉的，这一点没什么好担心。他的举止让我看到了真相：这具衰老的躯体之中，隐藏着强大战士的灵魂。像这样的战士，曾在无数场战斗中屹立不倒，在深及膝盖的鲜血中颂唱着严峻的祷告。”

languages.text: "Ich sehe keinen Grund zur Sorge, dass der Kopf dieses Mannes auf seinen Schultern bleibt. Seine Haltung verrät mir alles ... dieser geschundene Körper gehörte einem mächtigen Krieger, der in der Schlacht blutverschmiert und mit einem grimmigen Gebet auf den Lippen standhaft bleibt."
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe keinen Grund zur Sorge, dass der Kopf dieses Mannes auf seinen Schultern bleibt. Seine Haltung verrät mir alles ... dieser geschundene Körper gehörte einem mächtigen Krieger, der in der Schlacht blutverschmiert und mit einem grimmigen Gebet auf den Lippen standhaft bleibt."

languages.text: « Je ne flaire aucune raison de craindre pour sa vie. Son seul maintien parle pour lui, et ce corps usé trahit l'esprit d'un redoutable guerrier, de ceux qui dominent le champ de bataille, du sang jusqu'aux genoux et une sombre prière aux lèvres. »
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne flaire aucune raison de craindre pour sa vie. Son seul maintien parle pour lui, et ce corps usé trahit l'esprit d'un redoutable guerrier, de ceux qui dominent le champ de bataille, du sang jusqu'aux genoux et une sombre prière aux lèvres. »

languages.text: "Bunun kafası omuzlarından ayrı düşer diye endişe etmeye neden görmüyorum. Tavırları bana her şeyi anlatıyor. Bu yıpranmış beden, savaşın ortasında dizine kadar kana batmış hâlde dimdik duran ve dudaklarından amansız bir dua dökülen kudretli bir savaşçının ruhuna ters düşüyor."
languages.original_text: "I smell no reason to worry about this one's head staying on his shoulders. His bearing tells me all — this worn body belies the spirit of a mighty warrior, the kind who stands tall in the midst of battle, knee-deep in blood and with a grim prayer on his lips."
